Now I can create the commit with a message that summarizes the key changes. The message should be clear and descriptive, following good commit message practices with a brief subject line and detailed body.

git commit -m "refactor: consolidate metric functionality into RiemannianMetric class

- Move metric function pointers into Surface as primary resources
- Create dedicated RiemannianMetric class with constant components
- Replace metric.hpp/cpp with riemannian_metric.hpp/cpp
- Update surface implementations with analytical derivatives
- Maintain mathematical documentation in code comments
- Update build system to reflect new structure
- Verify space transformation tests pass"
